verses.verse: These <S%G3778><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Promises, <S%G1860><s%> Beloved, <S%G27><s%> We Should Cleanse <S%G2511><s%> Ourselves <S%G1438><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Defilement <S%G3436><s%> Of Flesh <S%G4561><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> Perfecting <S%G2005><s%> Holiness <S%G42><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Fear <S%G5401><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>
Receive <S%G5562><s%> Us : <S%G2248><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Did We Wrong, <S%G91><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Did We Corrupt, <S%G5351><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Did We Overreach. <S%G4122><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> Condemnation <S%G2633><s%> I Speak, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G4280><s%> For I Have Before Said <S%G1063><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Our Hearts <S%G2257><s%> Ye Are, <S%G2075><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Die Together <S%G4880><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Live Together. <S%G4800><s%>

Great Is <S%G4183><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> Boldness <S%G3954><s%> Towards <S%G4314><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> Great <S%G4183><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> Boasting <S%G2746><s%> In Respect Of <S%G5228><s%> You; <S%G5216><s%> I Have Been Filled <S%G4137><s%> <S%G3588><s%> With Encouragement; <S%G3874><s%> I Overabound <S%G5248><s%> <S%G3588><s%> With Joy <S%G5479><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2347><s%> Out Tribulation. <S%G2257><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> For Indeed, <S%G1063><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> We <S%G2257><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Macedonia, <S%G3109><s%> Not Any <S%G3762><s%> Had <S%G2192><s%> Ease <S%G425><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4561><s%> Our Flesh, <S%G2257><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Every Way <S%G3956><s%> Being Oppressed; <S%G2346><s%> Without <S%G1855><s%> Contentions, <S%G3163><s%> Within <S%G2081><s%> Fears. <S%G5401><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Encourages <S%G3870><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Brought Low <S%G5011><s%> Encouraged <S%G3870><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Coming <S%G3952><s%> Of Titus; <S%G5103><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> <S%G3440><s%> And Not Only <S%G1161><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3952><s%> His Coming, <S%G846><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Encouragement <S%G3874><s%> With Which <S%G3739><s%> He Was Encouraged <S%G3870><s%> ' As To <S%G1909><s%> You; <S%G5213><s%> Relating <S%G312><s%> To Us <S%G2254><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5216><s%> Your Longing, <S%G1972><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5216><s%> Your Mourning, <S%G3602><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5216><s%> Your Zeal <S%G2205><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> Me; <S%G1700><s%> <S%G5620><s%> So As For Me <S%G3165><s%> The More <S%G3123><s%> To Be Rejoiced. <S%G5463><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> I Grieved <S%G3076><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Epistle, <S%G1992><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Do Not Regret It, <S%G3338><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> I Did Regret; <S%G3338><s%> <S%G991><s%> For I See <S%G1063><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1992><s%> That Epistle, <S%G1565><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> An Hour, <S%G5610><s%> Grieved <S%G3076><s%> You. <S%G5209><s%>

Now <S%G3568><s%> I Rejoice, <S%G5463><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Ye Were Grieved, <S%G3076><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Ye Were Grieved <S%G3076><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Repentance; <S%G3341><s%> <S%G3076><s%> For Ye Were Grieved <S%G1063><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Nothing <S%G3367><s%> Ye Might Suffer Loss <S%G2210><s%> By <S%G1537><s%> Us. <S%G2257><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> For The <S%G1063><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Grief <S%G3077><s%> Repentance <S%G3341><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Salvation <S%G4991><s%> Not To Be Regretted <S%G278><s%> Works Out; <S%G2716><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> Grief <S%G3077><s%> Death <S%G2288><s%> Works Out. <S%G2716><s%>

<S%G2400><s%> For To, <S%G1063><s%> <S%G846><s%> This Same Thing, <S%G5124><s%> <S%G3588><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> To Have Been Grieved <S%G3076><s%>, You, <S%G5209><s%> How Much <S%G4214><s%> It Worked Out <S%G2716><s%> In You <S%G5213><s%> Diligence, <S%G4710><s%> But What <S%G235><s%> Defence, <S%G627><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Indignation, <S%G24><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Fear, <S%G5401><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Longing, <S%G1972><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Zeal, <S%G2205><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Vengeance! <S%G1557><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Every Way <S%G3956><s%> Ye Proved <S%G4921><s%> Yourselves <S%G1438><s%> Pure <S%G53><s%> To Be <S%G1511><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Matter. <S%G4229><s%>

Then <S%G686><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> I Wrote <S%G1125><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> For The Sake Of <S%G1752><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Did Wrong, <S%G91><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> For The Sake Of <S%G1752><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Suffered Wrong, <S%G91><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> For The Sake Of <S%G1752><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Being Manifested <S%G5319><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Diligence <S%G4710><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> Us <S%G2257><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> We Have Been Encouraged <S%G3870><s%> In <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Encouragement <S%G3874><s%> Your, <S%G5216><s%> <S%G4056><s%> And The Abundantly <S%G1161><s%> Rather <S%G3123><s%> We Rejoiced <S%G5463><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Joy <S%G5479><s%> Of Titus, <S%G5103><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Has Been Refreshed <S%G373><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4151><s%> His Spirit <S%G846><s%> By <S%G575><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Of You. <S%G5216><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Anything <S%G5100><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> About <S%G5228><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> I Have Boasted, <S%G2744><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> I Was Put To Shame; <S%G2617><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Truth <S%G225><s%> We Spoke <S%G2980><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Boasting <S%G2746><s%> Of Us <S%G2257><s%> Which Was <S%G3588><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> Titus <S%G5103><s%> Truth <S%G225><s%> Became; <S%G1096><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4698><s%> His Bowels <S%G846><s%> More Abundantly <S%G4056><s%> Towards <S%G1519><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Are, <S%G2076><s%> Remembering <S%G363><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> Of You <S%G5216><s%> Obedience, <S%G5218><s%> How <S%G5613><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Fear <S%G5401><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Trembling <S%G5156><s%> Ye Received <S%G1209><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>
I Rejoice <S%G5463><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Everything <S%G3956><s%> I Am Confident <S%G2292><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> You. <S%G5213><s%>
